content: Lady Wisdom Gives a Dinner Party
The banquet meal is ready to be served: lamb roasted,
“Are you confused about life, don’t know what’s going on?
I’ve prepared a wonderful spread—fresh-baked bread,
If you reason with an arrogant cynic, you’ll get slapped in the face;
So don’t waste your time on a scoffer;
But if you correct those who care about life,
Save your breath for the wise—they’ll be wiser for it;
Skilled living gets its start in the Fear-of-,
It’s through me, Lady Wisdom, that your life deepens,
Live wisely and wisdom will permeate your life;
Then there’s this other woman, Madame Prostitute—
She sits on the front porch
And as people walk by minding
“Are you confused about life, don’t know what’s going on?
But they don’t know about all the skeletons in her closet,
